definition: to cut off/to cut away/to trim
scissors/shears/clippers/CL:把[ba3]/to cut with scissors/to trim/to wipe out or exterminate

to fall/to drop/to lag behind/to lose/to go missing/to reduce/fall (in prices)/to lose (value, weight etc)/to wag/to swing/to turn/to change/to exchange/to swap/to show off/to shed (hair)/(used after certain verbs to express completion, fulfillment, removal etc)

sentences.english: Could you cut a little more off at the temples?
sentences.chinese: 你可不可以在兩鬢處再剪掉一點？

sentences.english: Cut a limb from a tree.
It's getting a Bit too long, but tlon't cut it too much.
sentences.chinese: 頭髮長得太長了一點，不過別剪掉太多。

sentences.english: The channel agreed to cut scenes in future which glamorise or condone smoking.
sentences.chinese: 該頻道同意以後將剪掉所有美化和寬容吸菸的鏡頭。

sentences.english: Twenty minutes later, cut up credit cards littered the enclosure.
sentences.chinese: 二十分鐘後，把信用卡剪掉裝起來。

sentences.english: That is, unless they have been sheared .
sentences.chinese: 也就是說，除非等到它們被剪掉了。

sentences.english: TVB had full discretion every year to cut out any parts of the show from its broadcast.
sentences.chinese: 無線電視每年均有全權選擇在轉播時剪掉任何內容。

sentences.english: The lamina of douse wants to cut off.
sentences.chinese: 插入水中的葉片要剪掉。

sentences.english: Please trim the fringe a bit more.
sentences.chinese: 請將我殿前的頭髮再剪掉一點。

sentences.english: I don't know, but she did it rightafter she dumped me in September.
sentences.chinese: 不知道，不過她在九月份甩了我之後就立即剪掉了。

sentences.english: All her curls have been sheared away.
sentences.chinese: 她滿頭的捲髮都被剪掉了。

sentences.english: We need to trim away the rough edges on that hedge.
sentences.chinese: 我們需要把這樹籬不平整的邊緣剪掉。

sentences.english: When the loops have been sheared off on one side, the fabric is known as velour.
sentences.chinese: 把一邊的小圈圈全部剪掉的面料就叫做絲絨。

sentences.english: If you are using a moleskine book, cut off the elastic flush with the cover.
sentences.chinese: 如果你的本子是帶有皮筋的，要事先把皮筋剪掉。

sentences.english: That is, some branches of the tree that may lead to the model overfitting are cut off.
sentences.chinese: 這就是說，樹的某些導致模型過擬合的分支將被剪掉。

sentences.english: The gardener has lopped all the dead branches from the tree.
sentences.chinese: 園丁已經將樹上的所有枯枝剪掉了。

definition: scissors/shears/clippers/CL:把[ba3]/to cut with scissors/to trim/to wipe out or exterminate
to scrape off/to shave off (whiskers etc)/(of the wind) to blow sth away
to shave the whole head clean/crushing defeat
